author: glasser
msg: Remove svn_depth_exclude from the API.  It was an implementation
detail of some of the modules which processed depth, not a
Arguably, it *would* be useful to have a concept of svn_depth_exclude,
so that you could do things like "check all of A except for A/D".
However, we did not implement that (at least, we didn't document it if
we did, though it may have worked by accident).  Perhaps we'll add

author: glasser
msg: Eliminate use of svn_depth_exclude in the WC status editor.
I believe that svn_depth_exclude is an implementation detail and
will remove it from our API.
(dir_baton): Add an "excluded" boolean field to the dir baton.
Note that the depth field is undefined if this is true.
